title: Tier 2 Clash Team Looking for A Mid Laner
body:
Hello, 
My friends and I are playing clash tonight. Our lock in is at 7PM PST, 10PM EST. (3 hours from now)
We are in need of a mid laner.
Our team is as follows:
D4 Top
D4 JG
__ Mid
G1 ADC
P1 Support
Please comment with your ingame name and rank, I will add you. 
My ign is Lshaan, you can add me also, just be sure to comment so I know your looking to play clash. 
We will be using comms (discord)
Thanks :)

replies.body: i would be willing to be your midlaner tonight im a bronze 2 mid and in game name is Miketel Uchiha
